mapper.select: select coalesce(sum(p.payment_price), 0) from tbl_advertisement a join tbl_payment p on a.id = p.advertisement_id where a.company_id = #{companyId} and a.advertisement_request_status = 'accept'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_advertisement ( advertisement_main_text, advertisement_sub_text, advertisement_status, advertisement_request_status, advertise_start_datetime, advertise_end_datetime, company_id ) values ( #{advertisementMainText}, #{advertisementSubText}, 'active', 'await', #{advertiseStartDatetime}::date, #{advertiseEndDatetime}::date, #{companyId} )
insert into tbl_payment ( payment_price, payment_status, advertisement_id, user_id ) values ( #{paymentPrice}, 'active', #{advertisementId}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: update tbl_advertisement set advertisement_main_text = #{advertisementMainText}, advertisement_sub_text = #{advertisementSubText}, advertise_start_datetime = #{advertiseStartDatetime}::date, advertise_end_datetime = #{advertiseEndDatetime}::date, updated_datetime = now() where id = #{id}
update tbl_advertisement set advertisement_status = #{status}, updated_datetime = now() where id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.advertisement_main_text, a.advertisement_sub_text, a.advertise_start_datetime, a.advertise_end_datetime, a.advertisement_request_status, p.payment_price from tbl_advertisement a left join tbl_payment p on a.id = p.advertisement_id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_advertisement set advertisement_status = 'inactive' where advertise_end_datetime <= current_date
